headline: Cybersecurity challenges could pave the way to a unified approach
summary: Recent cybersecurity research from Cisco and Verizon paints a picture of risk and frustration as organisations contend with managing tools that don’t work together. The need for more effective security could drive a more unified approach in the future

raw.headline: Cybersecurity challenges could pave the way to a unified approach
raw.summary: Recent cybersecurity research from Cisco and Verizon paints a picture of risk and frustration as organisations contend with managing tools that don’t work together. The need for more effective security could drive a more unified approach in the future

headline: Verizon to speak at Bernstein conference May 29
summary: NEW YORK, May 27, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Sowmyanarayan Sampath, executive vice president for Verizon (NYSE, Nasdaq: VZ), and CEO for Verizon Consumer, is scheduled to speak at the Bernstein Strategic Decisions Conference on Thursday, May 29, at 8:00 a.m. ET. His remarks will be webcast, with access instructions available on Verizon’s Investor Relations website, www.verizon.com/about/investors. For details on Verizon's most recent financial results, view the company's 1Q25 earnings results here
